archimate:CustomerFacingService.name: Customer Facing Service
archimate:CustomerFacingService.documentation: A Customer Facing Service is the primary service presented to the customer. Commissioned / discovered because of the contribution it makes to fulfilling one or more business aims and stakeholder needs. Stakeholder needs are sometimes described in quite vague terms and may need some interpretation which is why there are Additional element of Purpose and Objective. Desired customer facing services should usually support / contribute to the achievement of one or more stakeholder goal.

properties.value: Potential; Proposed; Planned; Discovery; Alpha; Beta; Live; Legacy; Retired
